title: Jungle Rose
summaries: The Jungle Rose is a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) vanity accessory / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) vanity item which can be harvested from the floor of the Jungle. It can only be equipped in the (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) accessory slot / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) head slot.
Jungle Roses appear as 1 block tall red flowers on Jungle grass. Cutting them drops a Jungle Rose, with a chance of 1/20 (5%).

statistics.Sell: 20 CC
